title: Flatbush Zombies x Trash Talk – “Modern Mayhem” (OFFICIAL AUDIO STREAM)
description:
“Modern Mayhem” is the fourth single off of the second Converse CONS compilation, CONS EP Vol. 2, with one final single coming later this fall. The song was produced by Trash Talk’s Garrett Stevenson and recorded at Converse Rubber Tracks in Brooklyn, New York.

Produced by: Trash Talk x Flatbush Zombies
Music by: Trash Talk
Lyrics by: Flatbush Zombies 
Vocals by: Flatbush Zombies
Mixed by: Benjamin Julia
Mastered by: Mike Bozzi
